entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 8:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -14.7°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Humidity: 40 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -25.4°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. High minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
